name: Plus button on Sidebar Region should be round when it has a focus

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Thursday, October 01, 2020 4:10 PM
• Set back to Active for manual testing

inline.description:
Plus button on Sidebar Region should be round when it has a focus
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Use CTRL+F6 (F6 on desktop app) to navigate to "Team Menu Region"
  2. Press TAB until you are focused on the "Channel Sidebar Region"
  3. Use TAB to navigate to the "Plus" buttons beside Public channels, Private Channels, as well as Direct Messages
inline.expectedResult: • The focus indicator should be round on all the plus buttons

customFields.Related ticket(s):
• Focus indicator on create new channel buttons is not round — MM-17139
  • (Task) Accessibility Cypress Test Automation: Accessibility Support in Channel Sidebar Navigation — MM-22630
